name: go4out
tag_list: mobile, recommendation, social, outdoor, online, decision-facilitation, discovery, geo-location, startup, restaurant, bar, club, cultural, event, share, places
overview:
go4out is a decision facilitator for chosing the right place to go out.

It is a breakthrough recommendation service for social activities that aims at making the selection of a venue fast and joyfully easy. The promise: 1 click, 4 places, all relevant and different, and I find a place to go in less than 20 seconds.

go4out enables people to easily discover new places to go in no time. Places that will measure up to their expectations, and satisfy a need for relevance and diversity. We act as an assistant for our users, from the very beginning of the search, to the end of their activity, and through the planning phase of it. It is a private space online for personal recommendations, from which users can share with their relatives, leveraging the tools and networks they already use. go4out is not a social network.

Nowadays, consumers are willing to meet in the real world, leveraging social networks and digital tools to facilitate communication and organization. When doing so, they look forward to breaking the routine, discovering new places, and being able to share those discoveries with their relatives in a trend-setter approach. Speaking of tools to help them do that, they look for fast, simple, mobile and connected. In terms of content, they demand relevancy, customization, innovative user experiences fitting the way they think. However, they are still striving to find a tool, whatever it may be, measuring up to those expectations. A tool that is able to take online traditional social recommendation with all the key attributes mentioned above.
